title: 52. Quarantine Special: "Why Do I feel so Obsessed and Attached to Them?"
description:
Hey girl!

In this episode, we talk about feeling "obsessed" with that potential partner, or that person you are "talking to", or even that person you have been ghosted to (hey what happened to them and why are they ignoring me?) we go into DETAIL about why we panic, why we get obsessed, and why we want more from those that give us less. Hint: it's not you, it's the pattern of thinking you were raised with. Are you ready to dive deep into this topic? I'll see you on the other side!

xx Beatrice

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Check out https://trybetterhelp.com/selflovefix to save 10% on your first month of online therapy/counseling through better help professional counseling (Sponsored by Betterhelp).
